project.description: Triggers (only triggers) mkcloud gating builds for pull requests to the github crowbar repos

hudson.model.ChoiceParameterDefinition.name: mode
hudson.model.ChoiceParameterDefinition.description: normal: trigger unseen PRs rebuild: trigger unseend and pending PRs forcerebuild: trigger unseen, pending and failed PRs

hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
## THIS IS A TRIGGER JOB ONLY - NO WORKER CODE IN HERE - DO NOT DARE TO ADD SOME ## TRIGGER JOBS ARE MOVED TO A DEDICATED TRIGGER NODE ## THIS JOB IS ABOUT PRs FOR THE CROWBAR REPOs
set -x
export automationrepo=~/github.com/SUSE-Cloud/automation
if ! [ -e ${automationrepo}/scripts/jenkins/update_automation ] ; then mkdir -p ${automationrepo}/scripts/jenkins curl -o ${automationrepo}/scripts/jenkins/update_automation https://raw.githubusercontent.com/SUSE-Cloud/automation/master/scripts/jenkins/update_automation chmod a+x ${automationrepo}/scripts/jenkins/update_automation fi # fetch the latest automation updates ${automationrepo}/scripts/jenkins/update_automation
ghs=${automationrepo}/scripts/github-status/github-status.rb
action=list-unseen-prs case $mode in rebuild) action=list-rebuild-prs ;; forcerebuild) action=list-forcerebuild-prs ;; esac
# PR testing for crowbar repos declare -a crowbar_repos=( crowbar crowbar-ceph crowbar-core crowbar-ha crowbar-hyperv crowbar-openstack barclamp-ceilometer barclamp-ceph barclamp-cinder barclamp-cisco-ucs barclamp-crowbar barclamp-database barclamp-dell_raid barclamp-deployer barclamp-dns barclamp-ganglia barclamp-glance barclamp-heat barclamp-ipmi barclamp-keystone barclamp-logging barclamp-manila barclamp-network barclamp-neutron barclamp-nfs_client barclamp-nova barclamp-nova_dashboard barclamp-ntp barclamp-openstack barclamp-pacemaker barclamp-provisioner barclamp-rabbitmq barclamp-raid barclamp-suse-manager-client barclamp-swift barclamp-tempest barclamp-trove barclamp-updater )
declare -a master_branches_old=( release/tex/master release/stoney/master )
declare -a master_branches=( master )
for repo in ${crowbar_repos[@]}; do declare -a branches=() case $repo in crowbar) branches=( "${master_branches_old[@]}" "${master_branches[@]}" ) ;; crowbar-*) branches=${master_branches[@]} ;; barclamp-crowbar-*) branches=${master_branches_old[@]} ;; esac
for branch in ${branches[@]} ; do for github_pr in $($ghs -r crowbar/$repo -a $action -b $branch) ; do ${automationrepo}/scripts/jenkins/jenkins-job-trigger \ cloud-crowbar-testbuild-pr -p crowbar_repo=$repo crowbar_github_pr=$github_pr github_pr_opts=(${github_pr//:/ }) github_pr_sha=${github_pr_opts[1]}
# set status to pending $ghs -r crowbar/$repo -a set-status -s "pending" -t $BUILD_URL -c $github_pr_sha done done done
